alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 25 at 8:25AM PST until November 27 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 34 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley and Central Sacramento Valley Counties. * WHEN...For Sunday, from 2 AM to 9 AM PST. For Monday, from 2 AM to 9 AM PST. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will damage sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures will impact the unhoused and those without adequate heating.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley
